__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Atakebune
data.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with rockets.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Vulnerable vs. Incendiary Ships
- Low movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
装备有火箭的大型有帆战船。
+ 反建筑专家
- 不擅长对抗燃烧战船
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Battering Ram
data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
耐久的步兵运输工具，擅长对付建筑及城墙。
+ 高远程护甲
+ 高生命值
- 只能通过近战攻击受到额外的伤害
- 只能攻击建筑
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Bombard
data.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire
data.descriptionCN:
可怕的攻城炮，非常擅于对付建筑或任何顽强的目标。
+ 高伤害
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units
data.descriptionCN:
强大的攻城器械，擅长从极远的距离摧毁建筑及城墙。
+ 对建筑有伤害加成
- 必须架设才能开火
- 无法精准命中单位

data.name: Daimyo
data.description:
High health and damage melee cavalry that provides an aura that increases attack speed of nearby military units. Effective against melee units. Limited to one per Daimyo Estate built.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
高生命值、高伤害的近战骑兵，提供的光环可提高附近军事单位的攻击速度。擅长对付近战单位。每个已建造的大名庄园限造一个。
+ 重型护甲
+ 近战能力强大
 - 会受到长矛兵和弩手克制

data.name: Explosive Junk
data.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction
data.descriptionCN:
装满炸药的小船。被歼灭后会爆炸，对区域内的所有单位造成伤害。
- 离爆炸中心越远造成伤害越低
- 自毁是唯一武器

data.name: Fishing Boat
data.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat
data.descriptionCN:
从深海鱼群或海岸鱼群采集食物的小型船只。在码头处存放采集到的资源。
+ 可以修理
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Ikko-ikki Monk
data.description:
Warrior Monk with strong combat capabilities that heals nearby units when attacking. Does not have a targeted heal ability.
+ Can heal themselves
- Slow move speed
data.descriptionCN:
拥有强大战斗能力的僧侣战士，进攻时可治疗附近单位。不具备定向治疗能力。
+ 可以治疗自己
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Junk
data.description:
Oared war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology
data.descriptionCN:
载有步弓手的带桨战船。
+ 操控性提升
+ 可从铁匠铺的远程伤害科技中获得加成

data.name: Kanabo Samurai
data.description:
Tough infantry with good damage. Deals +6% of enemy max health as bonus damage.
+ High health
+ Strong against high health units 
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
伤害较高的强悍步兵。对敌人造成额外伤害，相当于其最大生命值的 +6%。
+ 高生命值
+ 擅长对付高生命值单位
- 移动速度慢
- 会受到弩手克制

data.description:
Tough infantry with good damage. Deals +6% of enemy max health as bonus damage.
+ High health
+ Strong against high health units 
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Crossbowmen

- 移动速度慢
- 会受到弩手克制

data.description:

+ High health
+ Strong against high health units 
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:

+ 擅长对付高生命值单位
- 移动速度慢

data.name: Mangonel
data.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
- Must be set up to fire
data.descriptionCN:
可发射多枚炮弹对范围区域造成伤害。
+ 擅长对付成群的单位
- 必须架设才能开火

data.name: Mounted Samurai
data.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and a powerful charge attack.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
拥有强大冲锋能力和杀伤力的昂贵骑兵。
+ 重型护甲
+ 近战能力强大
- 会受到长矛兵和弩手克制

data.name: Elite Mounted Samurai
data.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and a powerful charge attack.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

+ 近战能力强大
- 会受到长矛兵和弩手克制

data.name: Naginata Samurai
data.description:
Heavy infantry with good damage and defense.
+ Heavy armor
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
重装步兵，具有良好的伤害和防御力。
+ 重型护甲
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到骑士、长矛骑兵和弩手克制

data.description:

+ Heavy armor
- Slow move speed

data.name: Early Ozutsu
data.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
强大的多用途远程步兵。
+ 高伤害
- 高成本
- 移动速度慢
- 会受到骑手克制

data.name: Ozutsu
data.description:
Ranged infantry equipped with a huge gunpowder weapon that has good weapon range, siege, and splash damage.
+ Anti-building
+ Area damage
- Slow move speed
- Slow attack speed
- Countered by Horsemen and Crossbowmen
data.descriptionCN:
远程步兵，装备巨大的火药武器，拥有优秀的武器攻击范围、攻城和溅射伤害。
+ 反建筑
+ 范围伤害
- 移动速度慢
- 攻击速度慢
- 会受到骑手和弩手克制

data.name: Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
+ High movement speed
- Very weak in combat
data.descriptionCN:
轻武装骑兵，擅长探索世界、狩猎野生动物及牧羊。
+ 能看穿浓密森林
+ 具有生命值恢复能力
+ 高移动速度
- 战斗能力非常弱

data.name: Siege Tower
data.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.
+ High ranged armor
- Cannot attack
- Slow movement speed
data.descriptionCN:
高大的步兵运输工具，不具备战斗能力。允许将其中驻扎的步兵直接投放到石墙上。
+ 高远程护甲
- 无法攻击
- 移动速度较慢

data.name: Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Additional damage against Elephants
- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers
data.descriptionCN:
最适合用来对付骑兵单位的步兵。
+ 反骑兵专家
+ 可对象兵造成额外伤害
- 不擅长对付重型步兵
- 会受到弓兵克制

data.description:

- Weak against heavy infantry
- Countered by Archers

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings
data.descriptionCN:
反单位攻城武器。能发射可穿透多个单位的弩箭。
+ 无需架设即可发射
+ 对近战步兵造成额外伤害
- 对建筑造成的伤害极低

data.name: Tanegashima Ashigaru
data.description:
Powerful ranged infantry that is effective against armored units.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
强大的远程步兵，擅长对付拥有护甲的单位。
+ 高伤害
- 高成本
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到骑兵克制

data.name: Elite Tanegashima Ashigaru
data.description:
Powerful ranged infantry that is effective against armored units.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
强大的远程步兵，擅长对付拥有护甲的单位。
+ 高伤害
- 高成本
- 移动速度较慢
- 会受到骑兵克制

data.name: Tanegashima Ashigaru Levy
data.description:
Powerful ranged infantry that is effective against armored units.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
强大的远程步兵，擅长对付拥有护甲的单位。
+ 高伤害

data.name: Trade Ship
data.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat
data.descriptionCN:
商船在被派往有海岸贸易站或其他玩家码头的贸易路线时，可产生黄金和木材。
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Trader
data.description:
Traders generate Gold by travelling between their Home Market and a Trade Post or another player's Market. Greater distances between the Home Market and trade destination will generate higher amounts of Gold.
The Home Market or Trade destination may be changed at any time.
data.descriptionCN:
商人通过在他们的本国市场和贸易站或其他玩家的市场之间的往来产生黄金。本国市场和贸易目的地之间的距离越远，产生的黄金就越多。
本国市场或贸易目的地可以随时更改。

data.name: Transport Ship
data.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
- No combat
data.descriptionCN:
大型带桨船只，可运送陆上单位渡过水域。
+ 任何单位都能驻扎
+ 使用驻扎于其中的单位的视野范围
- 不具备战斗能力

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat.
When 5 or more stone is deposited an extra 20% gold is produced and when 5 or more gold is deposited an extra 20% stone is produced.
data.descriptionCN:
采集木材、食物、石料和黄金。建造和修理建筑，也可以修理攻城器械和海军单位。
- 战斗能力弱。
当石料储量达到 5 或更多时，会产出额外 20% 的黄金，当黄金储量达到 5 或更多时，会产出额外 20% 的石料。

data.name: War Junk
data.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability
data.descriptionCN:
配备船侧弩炮的船只。
+ 很擅长对付步弓手船
- 操控性较低

data.name: Yari Cavalry
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Bonus damage against cavalry.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼攻击和克制远程单位。可对骑兵造成加成伤害。
+ 移动速度快
- 不擅长对付近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Veteran Yari Cavalry
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Bonus damage against cavalry.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼攻击和克制远程单位。可对骑兵造成加成伤害。
+ 移动速度快
- 不擅长对付近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.description:

+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼攻击和克制远程单位。可对骑兵造成加成伤害。
+ 移动速度快
- 不擅长对付近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Yari Cavalry Levy
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Bonus damage against cavalry.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen
data.descriptionCN:
快速骑兵擅长突袭、侧翼攻击和克制远程单位。可对骑兵造成加成伤害。
+ 移动速度快
- 不擅长对付近战单位
- 会受到长矛兵克制

data.name: Yatai
data.description:
Collects Food from nearby sources without consuming them in addition to a base rate of 20 Food every minute. After collecting enough Food it will send a trader to its Home Matsuri, which improves the Matsuri gather rate aura by 5%, +250 health and grants +50 additional Food. 
Food sources overlapped by multiple Yatai are only counted once and Boar do not retaliate while near a Yatai. The Yatai is limited to 3 and is increased by +1 per age up.
data.descriptionCN:
从附近来源收集食物，但不会进行消耗，此外基础速率为每分钟 20 食物。收集到足够的食物后，将会派出一名商人前往参加主祭典，这可让祭典采集速率光环 +5%，生命值 +250，并额外提供 +50 的食物。
多个屋台所覆盖的食物来源只计算一次，野猪在屋台附近时不会反击。屋台的上限为 3，并且每次提升时代 +1。

data.name: Yumi Ashigaru
data.description:
Quick and cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ Increased move speed
+ Cheaper than Archers
- Reduced health
- Weak against high ranged armor targets
- Countered by Horsemen
data.descriptionCN:
行动迅速且成本低廉的远程步兵，能对无护甲的目标造成可观伤害。
+ 移动速度较高
+ 比弓兵成本低
- 生命值较低
- 不擅长对付高远程护甲目标
- 会受到骑手克制
